description: Play is powerful in learning.  It is engaging, energizing, and enlightening.  This class explores a
range of physical activities designed to develop physical skill, confidence, and intelligence--all
in the spirit of play.  It incorporates activities for developing body organization and alignment
while challenging students' imagination and creative sensibilities.  Tumbling, terraining, contact
improvisation, and ball play represent a few of the included activities.  Offered annually
